alert.note: Alert for Butte; Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Harding; Hermosa Foot Hills; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Rapid City; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 04 at 2:07AM MDT until April 07 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph possible. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Wyoming and northwestern, southwestern and the Black Hills of South Dakota. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...The high winds could blow down large trees and damage roofs, small outbuildings, and signs. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers are expected late Tuesday night into Wednesday with light accumulations possible, generally an inch or less, especially across far northwest South Dakota and northeast Wyoming. The strong winds and snowfall could lead to patchy blowing and drifting snow Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
